text: Aleqa Hammond (born 23 September 1965) is a Greenlandic politician. She was the leader of the Siumut party and also the country's first female Prime Minister after her party emerged as the largest in the 2013 elections.Mining proponents win Greenland election AP, 13 March 2013 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Greenland Category:Protestants
title: Aleqa Hammond
